channel.description: Recent content in Internet Society on Cisco Skills

item.title: World IPv6 Day!!
item.description: IPv6 So what is IPv6 day? Today major companies like Google, Facebook, Yahoo and ISPs (Internet Service Providers) test their IPv6 deployments. Why is this important? Well if you follow IPv4 news you might already know that IPv4 addresses have been exhausted and the need to move to different address space is critical, if new web services are to be deployed. The question is can we run both? Although running two different IP addressing protocols is likely, by "stacking" them that is one reason the Internet Society wanted major sites and ISPs to test out the IPv6 address space.
